title: 2500 world tokens for prestige popstar kai'sa. IS THIS A JOKE?!
body: how on earth does riot expect anyone to save 2500 world tokens for this skin, especially when they hardly even announced it. i've been grinding for days just to get a mere 700, [removed - mature content]

It’s very achievable in my opinion, considering I only play for a few hours inbetween studying and I’m already half way there. I have been trying to get level 7 Irelia and keep getting S- so I do get the 8 tokens + the win tokens, but keep trying. To be in track you’ll need about 975 tokens by the end of the week.
Basically have to still be in school to have enough time to play enough games for this. Anyone with a job or a life won't even be able to come close.

It's not out yet. Next weekend. The K/DA skins are part of the 'After Party' portion of the event which I'm assuming will start after the Grand Final (or at the very least, on the day of).
Is anyone able to confirm if popstar Kai'sa will be a purchasable skin if in the event summoners do not accrue enough tokens to get her??

K/DA Kai'sa will be purchaseable, but the presitge edition chroma as far as we know will only be available for this event. It's possible it will be legacy and return in the same manner for worlds next year, but I wouldn't count on it.

This post really isn't anything we'd ever consider deleting under that rule. OP is entitled to feel the token gains are very slow, and those commenting are entitled to refute that with their own experience, such is the point of discussion. It's when discussion is ignored or denied in favour of baseless complaining despite what other people have shared that it can become a problem.

The only rule OP really broke was the mature content rule, and even that only because the game is rated M (13+ish) and so we have to be fairly strict, more than it being anything particularly offensive, hence the removal of the rather explicit analogy he used.
